languages.text: "Следи за выражениями, {name} — это мон-кай пристало бежать и скрываться, а не моему роду. Комморра — наследие наших предков. Когда-то они нашли способ проникать в переплетения Паутины и перемещаться по ее запутанным лабиринтам. Немногие рискнут путешествовать и тем более возводить свои бастионы в этом раздробленном царстве. Друкари — единственные эльдары, которые не страшатся ужасов Паутины, ибо каждая преодоленная опасность делает нас сильнее".

"Watch it, {name} — it is mon-keigh who run and hide, not our kin. Commorragh is the legacy of our ancestors. They found a way to penetrate the tangle of the Webway and move through its twisting labyrinths. Few would hazard to travel in this splintered kingdom, let alone erect bastions in it. The Drukhari are the only Aeldari who do not fear the horrors of the Webway, for every peril we overcome makes us stronger."
languages.original_text: "Следи за выражениями, {name} — это мон-кай пристало бежать и скрываться, а не моему роду. Комморра — наследие наших предков. Когда-то они нашли способ проникать в переплетения Паутины и перемещаться по ее запутанным лабиринтам. Немногие рискнут путешествовать и тем более возводить свои бастионы в этом раздробленном царстве. Друкари — единственные эльдары, которые не страшатся ужасов Паутины, ибо каждая преодоленная опасность делает нас сильнее".

Few would hazard to travel in this splintered kingdom, let alone erect bastions in it. The Drukhari are the only Aeldari who do not fear the horrors of the Webway, for every peril we overcome makes us stronger."

They found a way to penetrate the tangle of the Webway and move through its twisting labyrinths. Few would hazard to travel in this splintered kingdom, let alone erect bastions in it. The Drukhari are the only Aeldari who do not fear the horrors of the Webway, for every peril we overcome makes us stronger."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: «Cuidadito, {name}. Son los mon-keigh quienes huyen y se esconden, no nosotros. Commorragh es el legado de nuestros antepasados. Encontraron la forma de penetrar las redes de la Telaraña y atravesar sus sinuosos laberintos. Pocos se atreverían a recorrer ese reino fragmentado, no digamos ya erigir un bastión en su interior. Los Drukhari somos los únicos Aeldari que no temen los peligros de la Telaraña, pues cada amenaza que superamos nos hace más fuertes».
languages.original_text: "Watch it, {name} — it is mon-keigh who run and hide, not our kin. Commorragh is the legacy of our ancestors. They found a way to penetrate the tangle of the Webway and move through its twisting labyrinths. Few would hazard to travel in this splintered kingdom, let alone erect bastions in it. The Drukhari are the only Aeldari who do not fear the horrors of the Webway, for every peril we overcome makes us stronger."

traits.locale_text: «Cuidadito, {name}. Son los mon-keigh quienes huyen y se esconden, no nosotros. Commorragh es el legado de nuestros antepasados. Encontraron la forma de penetrar las redes de la Telaraña y atravesar sus sinuosos laberintos. Pocos se atreverían a recorrer ese reino fragmentado, no digamos ya erigir un bastión en su interior. Los Drukhari somos los únicos Aeldari que no temen los peligros de la Telaraña, pues cada amenaza que superamos nos hace más fuertes».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: “说话当心点，{name}。只有猴子才会到处躲藏、四处逃窜，我们可不会。科摩罗是我们祖先的遗产，他们找到了通过网道的方法，可以在迷宫一样的路线中穿行。极少有人敢在这四分五裂的王国中穿行，更不用说建立堡垒了。在所有艾达灵族之中，只有黑暗灵族从不惧怕网道的恐怖之处，因为我们每战胜一次危机，都会变得强大一分。”
languages.original_text: "Watch it, {name} — it is mon-keigh who run and hide, not our kin. Commorragh is the legacy of our ancestors. They found a way to penetrate the tangle of the Webway and move through its twisting labyrinths. Few would hazard to travel in this splintered kingdom, let alone erect bastions in it. The Drukhari are the only Aeldari who do not fear the horrors of the Webway, for every peril we overcome makes us stronger."

traits.locale_text: “说话当心点，{name}。只有猴子才会到处躲藏、四处逃窜，我们可不会。科摩罗是我们祖先的遗产，他们找到了通过网道的方法，可以在迷宫一样的路线中穿行。极少有人敢在这四分五裂的王国中穿行，更不用说建立堡垒了。在所有艾达灵族之中，只有黑暗灵族从不惧怕网道的恐怖之处，因为我们每战胜一次危机，都会变得强大一分。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: 「気をつけろ、{name}。逃げ隠れしているのはモン＝ケイであって、俺の同族じゃない。コモラフは我らの父祖の遺産だ。彼らは網辻を突破し、曲がりくねった迷路を通り抜ける方法を見つけた。この分かたれしものの王国を、危険を冒して旅しようとする者なんか滅多にいないし、ましてやそこに掩蔽壕を築こうとする者もほとんどいないだろう。デュカーリは網辻の恐怖を唯一恐れないアエルダリだ。なぜなら、乗り越えていくすべての危険が我々を強くしてくれるのだから」
languages.original_text: "Watch it, {name} — it is mon-keigh who run and hide, not our kin. Commorragh is the legacy of our ancestors. They found a way to penetrate the tangle of the Webway and move through its twisting labyrinths. Few would hazard to travel in this splintered kingdom, let alone erect bastions in it. The Drukhari are the only Aeldari who do not fear the horrors of the Webway, for every peril we overcome makes us stronger."

traits.locale_text: 「気をつけろ、{name}。逃げ隠れしているのはモン＝ケイであって、俺の同族じゃない。コモラフは我らの父祖の遺産だ。彼らは網辻を突破し、曲がりくねった迷路を通り抜ける方法を見つけた。この分かたれしものの王国を、危険を冒して旅しようとする者なんか滅多にいないし、ましてやそこに掩蔽壕を築こうとする者もほとんどいないだろう。デュカーリは網辻の恐怖を唯一恐れないアエルダリだ。なぜなら、乗り越えていくすべての危険が我々を強くしてくれるのだから」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: « Prenez garde, {name}... Fuite et dissimulation sont l'apanage des mon-keigh, pas des miens. Commorragh est l'héritage de nos ancêtres. Ils ont trouvé un moyen de pénétrer l'écheveau de la Toile et de s'orienter dans ses dédales. Rares sont ceux qui oseraient s'aventurer dans ce royaume fragmenté, sans même parler d'y ériger leurs bastions. Les Drukharis sont les seuls Aeldaris à ne pas craindre les horreurs de la Toile, car chaque péril que nous surmontons nous rend plus forts. »
languages.original_text: "Watch it, {name} — it is mon-keigh who run and hide, not our kin. Commorragh is the legacy of our ancestors. They found a way to penetrate the tangle of the Webway and move through its twisting labyrinths. Few would hazard to travel in this splintered kingdom, let alone erect bastions in it. The Drukhari are the only Aeldari who do not fear the horrors of the Webway, for every peril we overcome makes us stronger."

traits.locale_text: « Prenez garde, {name}... Fuite et dissimulation sont l'apanage des mon-keigh, pas des miens. Commorragh est l'héritage de nos ancêtres. Ils ont trouvé un moyen de pénétrer l'écheveau de la Toile et de s'orienter dans ses dédales. Rares sont ceux qui oseraient s'aventurer dans ce royaume fragmenté, sans même parler d'y ériger leurs bastions. Les Drukharis sont les seuls Aeldaris à ne pas craindre les horreurs de la Toile, car chaque péril que nous surmontons nous rend plus forts. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Vorsicht, {name} — es sind die Chem-Pan-Sey, die fliehen und sich verstecken, nicht wir. Commorragh ist das Vermächtnis unserer Ahnen. Sie haben einen Weg gefunden, das Gewirr des Netzes der Tausend Tore zu penetrieren und sich durch seine verworrenen Labyrinthe zu bewegen. Nur wenige würden es wagen, in dieses zersplitterte Königreich zu reisen, geschweige denn Bastionen darin zu errichten. Die Drukhari sind die einzigen Aeldari, welche das Grauen des Netzes der Tausend Tore nicht fürchten, denn jede Gefahr, die wir überwinden, macht uns stärker."
languages.original_text: "Watch it, {name} — it is mon-keigh who run and hide, not our kin. Commorragh is the legacy of our ancestors. They found a way to penetrate the tangle of the Webway and move through its twisting labyrinths. Few would hazard to travel in this splintered kingdom, let alone erect bastions in it. The Drukhari are the only Aeldari who do not fear the horrors of the Webway, for every peril we overcome makes us stronger."

traits.locale_text: "Vorsicht, {name} — es sind die Chem-Pan-Sey, die fliehen und sich verstecken, nicht wird. Commorragh ist das Vermächtnis unserer Ahnen. Sie haben einen Weg gefunden, das Gewirr des Netzes der Tausend Tore zu penetrieren und sich durch seine verworrenen Labyrinthe zu bewegen. Nur wenige würden es wagen, in dieses zersplitterte Königreich zu reisen, geschweige denn Bastionen darin zu errichten. Die Drukhari sind die einzigen Aeldari, welche das Grauen des Netzes der Tausend Tore nicht fürchten, denn jede Gefahr, die wir überwinden, macht uns stärker."

languages.original_text: "Watch it,  — it is mon-keigh who run and hide, not our kin. Commorragh is the legacy of our ancestors. They found a way to penetrate the tangle of the Webway and move through its twisting labyrinths. Few would hazard to travel in this splintered kingdom, let alone erect bastions in it. The Drukhari are the only Aeldari who do not fear the horrors of the Webway, for every peril we overcome makes us stronger."

languages.text: "Ağzını topla {name}... Kaçıp saklanmak bizim değil, mon-keighlerin işi. Commorragh, bize atalarımızdan miras. Ağyol'un karmaşıklığını çözüp dolambaçlı düğümlerinde yol almasını bilmişler. Bu paramparça krallıkta değil kaleler kurmaya, gezip dolaşmaya bile cesaretiniz yetmez. Drukhariler, Ağyol'un dehşetlerinden korkmayan yegâne Aeldarilerdir. Üstesinden geldiğimiz her tehdit, bizi güçlendirir."
languages.original_text: "Watch it, {name} — it is mon-keigh who run and hide, not our kin. Commorragh is the legacy of our ancestors. They found a way to penetrate the tangle of the Webway and move through its twisting labyrinths. Few would hazard to travel in this splintered kingdom, let alone erect bastions in it. The Drukhari are the only Aeldari who do not fear the horrors of the Webway, for every peril we overcome makes us stronger."

traits.locale_text: "Ağzını topla {name}... Kaçıp saklanmak bizim değil, mon-keighlerin işi. Commorragh, bize atalarımızdan miras. Ağyol'un karmaşıklığını çözüp dolambaçlı labirentlerine yön bulmasını bilmişler. Bu paramparça krallıkta değil kaleler kurmaya, gezip dolaşmaya bile cesaretiniz yetmez. Drukhariler, Ağyol'un dehşetlerinden korkmayan yegâne Aeldarilerdir. Üstesinden geldiğimiz her tehdit, bizi güçlendirir."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
